explanation: [0-0] A cute kitten is sleeping soundly on a blue fluffy blanket, covered with a blue blanket. The background is a room with blue curtains. The curtains and the window reflect lights. There is also a lit table lamp next to the curtains. In a thought bubble above the kitten's head, a splendid castle is displayed, with a Ferris wheel decorated with Mickey Mouse's head in the castle.

[0-3] The camera zooms in and shakes. In the picture, a cat stands confidently in a room with French windows and beige curtains. She is wearing a pink sweater and blue jeans, with her left hand on her waist and her right hand holding a ticket.

[3-5] Then the camera shakes again, and the scene switches back to the kitten, who is now wide-eyed, jumping happily on the wooden floor of the bedroom. Behind it is a window with light shining through.

[5-8] The camera shakes again, and the kitten stands at the entrance of a castle with wide eyes and an open mouth, happily. The archway of the entrance is decorated with colorful balloons on both sides. The camera then cuts, and now the kitten is sitting excitedly in a colorful spinning teacup at an amusement park. Many people can be seen playing in spinning teacups in the blurred background, and the blue-green roof is decorated with gold and red stripes.

[16-19] After a quick shake of the camera, the kitten now sits peacefully on the ground in front of Disney Castle, looking up to the upper right. Behind it, brilliant fireworks lit up the night sky, buildings on both sides of the road twinkled, and lights and cats were reflected in the puddles on the ground. The camera flashes again and the picture cuts to a doorway. The kitten stood happily at the open door, holding a gift box decorated with a gold ribbon in both hands, with Mickey Mouse and his friends on the wrapping paper. In the background behind it are green trees dotted with lights and houses with orange lights.
